allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Fix search endpoint crash when time filter is provided

DateOnly.ToDateTime\(TimeOnly\) creates DateTime with Kind=Unspecified,
which Npgsql rejects for timestamp with time zone columns. Use
DateTimeKind.Utc explicitly in both slot-filtering queries.

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.6 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
